languages.text: "Говорить на твоем языке — чуть меньшее испытание для моего терпения, чем слушать, как мон-кайская машина уродует наш язык. Кроме того, я хочу, чтобы ты как следует понимал{mf||а} то, что я буду тебе говорить".

traits.locale_text: "Говорить на твоем языке — чуть меньшее испытание для моего терпения, чем слушать, как мон-кайская машина уродует наш язык. Кроме того, я хочу, чтобы ты как следует понимал{mf||а} то, что я буду тебе говорить".

languages.text: "Speaking your language is slightly less trying for my patience than being forced to listen to a mon-keigh machine butchering our tongue. Besides, I want you to understand well what I am about to tell you."
languages.original_text: "Говорить на твоем языке — чуть меньшее испытание для моего терпения, чем слушать, как мон-кайская машина уродует наш язык. Кроме того, я хочу, чтобы ты как следует понимал{mf||а} то, что я буду тебе говорить".

traits.locale_text: "Speaking your language is slightly less trying for my patience than being forced to listen to a mon-keigh machine butchering our tongue. Besides, I want you to understand well that which I am about to tell you."

"Speaking your language is slightly less trying for my patience than being forced to listen to a mon-keigh machine butchering our tongue. Besides, I want you to understand well that which I am about to tell you."

"Speaking your language is slightly less trying for my patience than being forced to listen to a mon-keigh machine butchering our tongue. Besides, I want you to understand well what I am about to tell you."

"Speaking your language is slightly less trying for my patience than being forced to listen to a mon-keigh machine butchering our tongue. Besides, I want you to understand well what I am about to tell you."

"Speaking your language is slightly less trying for my patience than being forced to listen to a mon-keigh machine butchering our tongue. Besides, I want you to understand well what I am about to tell you."

languages.text: «Hablar tu idioma pone mi paciencia un poco menos a prueba que oír cómo una máquina mon-keigh mutila nuestra lengua. Además, quiero que entiendas bien lo que tengo que decirte».
languages.original_text: "Speaking your language is slightly less trying for my patience than being forced to listen to a mon-keigh machine butchering our tongue. Besides, I want you to understand well what I am about to tell you."

traits.locale_text: «Hablar tu idioma pone mi paciencia un poco menos a prueba que oír cómo una máquina mon-keigh mutila nuestra lengua. Además, quiero que entiendas bien lo que tengo que decirte».

languages.text: “比起听你们这群猴子用乱七八糟的腔调残害我们的语言，说你们的语言稍微没那么考验我的耐心。另外，我希望你能充分理解我接下来要说的话。”
languages.original_text: "Speaking your language is slightly less trying for my patience than being forced to listen to a mon-keigh machine butchering our tongue. Besides, I want you to understand well what I am about to tell you."

traits.locale_text: “比起听你们这群猴子用乱七八糟的腔调残害我们的语言，说你们的语言稍微没那么考验我的耐心。另外，我希望你能充分理解我接下来要说的话。”

languages.text: 「モン＝ケイの機械が我々の言語を粗雑に発するのを聞くより、お前たちの言語を話したほうがまだ耐えられるからな。それに、今から俺が話すことをしっかり理解してもらいたいからな」
languages.original_text: "Speaking your language is slightly less trying for my patience than being forced to listen to a mon-keigh machine butchering our tongue. Besides, I want you to understand well what I am about to tell you."

traits.locale_text: 「モン＝ケイの機械が我々の言語を粗雑に発するのを聞くより、お前たちの言語を話したほうがまだ耐えられるからな。それに、今から俺が話すことをしっかり理解してもらいたいのでね」

languages.text: "Eure Sprache zu sprechen, strapaziert meine Geduld weniger als einer Maschine der Chem-Pan-Sey zuzuhören, wie sie unserer Sprache Gewalt antut. Außerdem sollt Ihr genau verstehen, was ich Euch gleich sagen werde."
languages.original_text: "Speaking your language is slightly less trying for my patience than being forced to listen to a mon-keigh machine butchering our tongue. Besides, I want you to understand well what I am about to tell you."

traits.locale_text: "Eure Sprache zu sprechen, strapaziert meine Geduld weniger als einer Maschine der Chem-Pan-Sey zuzuhören, wie sie unserer Sprache Gewalt antut. Außerdem sollt Ihr genau verstehen, was ich Euch gleich sagen werde."

languages.original_text: "Speaking your language is slightly less trying for my patience than being forced to listen to a mon-keigh machine butchering our tongue. Besides, I want you to understand well what I am about to tell you."

languages.text: « Oui, parce que cela éprouve légèrement moins ma patience que d'avoir à écouter une machine mon-keigh massacrer la nôtre. De plus, je tiens à ce que vous compreniez parfaitement ce que je m'apprête à vous dire. »
languages.original_text: "Speaking your language is slightly less trying for my patience than being forced to listen to a mon-keigh machine butchering our tongue. Besides, I want you to understand well what I am about to tell you."

traits.locale_text: « Oui, parce que cela éprouve légèrement moins ma patience que d'avoir à écouter une machine mon-keigh massacrer la nôtre. De plus, je tiens à ce que vous compreniez parfaitement ce que je m'apprête à vous dire. »

languages.text: "Bir mon-keigh makinesinin konuşarak dilimizi katledişini duymaktansa sizin dilinizde konuşmayı yeğlerim. Hem sana söyleyeceklerimi iyice kavramanı istiyorum."
languages.original_text: "Speaking your language is slightly less trying for my patience than being forced to listen to a mon-keigh machine butchering our tongue. Besides, I want you to understand well what I am about to tell you."

traits.locale_text: "Bir mon-keigh makinesinin konuşarak dilimizi katledişini duymaktansa sizin dilinizde konuşmayı yeğlerim. Hem sana söyleyeceklerimi iyice kavramanı istiyorum."
